system.effect: Allows constructing of basic components. +10 to Extended Repairs Tech-use Checks as well as Acquisition Tests to restore Hull. +10 Achievement Points for Trade Objectives and at GM discrection can manufacture a small number of personal items, generally a few dozen of more common templates, such as basic ammo, weapons, gear, etc. One per Vessel.

description.value: Allows constructing of basic components. +10 to Extended Repairs Tech-use Checks as well as Acquisition Tests to restore Hull. +10 Achievement Points for Trade Objectives and at GM discrection can manufacture a small number of personal items, generally a few dozen of more common templates, such as basic ammo, weapons, gear, etc. One per Vessel.
